reviewText: Sorry - as someone who's been involved in indie films in the past, I really wanted to like this.  Turned it off about 30 minutes in.  Just not good. Slow, forced dialogue, bad sound quality, no reason to care about Angel, and I saw no sign of any comedy. I honestly feel bad knocking it, but all the great reviews so far pulled me in, so I would have liked fair warning that it does not feel like a professional production.
Look at all the shill reviews that read like they were written by a catalog-copy writer. Ugh. Saucy! Fun! Exclamation points galore! Avoid at all costs!
Great movie. Loved it. Kristen Springer and Lee Fleming what a great combination.
Very funny movie with heart! Great story, Kristen Springer brings her character to life in a lovable way!

Kristen Springer does a fantastic job portraying the tough, but lovable Angel Sommers!
Angel is a female bounty hunter tasked to deliver a criminal to the proper authorities before gangsters kill him.
Loved the band that played in the bar scene Who is that??
Lee Fleming did a great job writing and directing this fun, saucy, indie film! Loved the idea of a female bounty hunter  Nicely done!!

Where can I see more of this actress??

I thoroughly enjoyed Angel's Bounty.  It's a great action-adventure movie with a lot of humor and heart, and enough plot twists to keep the story moving along nicely.  Buy it- you won't be disappointed!
I really enjoyed this movie, great actors and actresses. Highly recommend watching this movie, you won't be disappointed.

Loved this film!!! Rock n Roll, Babes and I really love the lead actress. She is sexy and a natural!!
So glad I can buy it on Amazon, saw a preview and have been waiting to own this movie!

Very fun little movie. Well written with interesting, funny characters and great dialogue. Also, some killer music. Definitely an indie production. If you're looking for big explosions and special effects, this isn't gonna be it. But, if you wanna watch a good story brought to life with some great actors, definitely give this one a look.
